author: Laura Hoy
title: Why Trump Silenced Fauci on Hydroxychloroquine
description: Donald Trump's reluctance to accept that hydroxychloroquine may not be a cure-all for coronavirus could prove dangerous. The post Why Trump Silenced Fauci on Hydroxychloroquine appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Donald Trumps reluctance to accept that hydroxychloroquine may not treat coronavirus was clear when he kept Dr. Fauci from answering questions about it this weekend.
